content.description: The crux is between the first and second bolts.  Then the climbing drops to about 5.8.  The large flake between the third and fourth bolt is a bit funky but appears to be ok for climbing.  It is better to trend left at the third bolt.
content.protection: Bolts to chain and anchors at top.
content.location: Start on face holds a few feet left of Right 1.  Rap the route.

content.description: The crux is in the middle of the route. Characteristics  include positive holds on a relatively steep climb.
content.protection: Bolts, anchor and chains at the top.
content.location: The start is ten feet right of Power to Burn near a small tree.  Rap the route.

climbs.name: Too Cheap to Meet Her
climbs.fa: Noah Monagle & Bryan Pletta & Karl Kiser, Spring 2013

content.description: The route is relatively sustained with the crux above the second bolt.  Follow the climb to a common anchor with Right number 2.
content.protection: Bolts, anchor and chains on top.
content.location: Start a few feet right of Right number 2.  Rap the route.

content.description: Another moderate route with a crux down low.
content.location: Start a few feet right of Right number 1.  Rap the route.

content.description: Nice rock.  Be careful with the belay on a relatively narrow ledge (stick clipping the first bolt is good).  The crux is down low.
content.protection: Bolts, anchor and chains at top.
content.location: Climb starts at a tree on the right Terrace.  Rap the route.

climbs.name: Power to Burn
climbs.fa: Bryan Pletta & Noah Monagle & Karl Kiser, Spring 2013

content.description: Several crux moves present themselves between the third and fifth bolts.
content.protection: Bolts, anchor and chains at top.
content.location: The start is common with Too Cheap to Meet Her but go right at the second bolt.

content.description: The right side of the Terrace is separated from the center by a large gash.
